originalText.text:
Truly wish I could give zero stars. Went to support this new spot and the happy hour was cute. The drinks were not consistent but for $5 I can‚Äôt complain.

Went Saturday night and immediately had to check our coats in‚Ä¶ but why were people inside wearing theirs? As soon as we enter, a waiter asks if we want a table, to which we reply that we wanna sit at the bar. He says there‚Äôs no room so we have to sit at a table, which he prepares for us. Then a bottle girl tells us we have to buy a bottle to sit at a table. Lol what? We just trying to have a beer and vibe to some music.

So‚Ä¶ as we originally wanted, we go to the bar. The bartender gives us our beers and when my friend went to close her tab, he was wild rude for no reason. The pen she was using to sign the check must have been the only pen in the entire place, cus the way he was shaking his head and rolling his eyes waiting for her to finish was crazy. She tipped him anyway so I hope he survived whatever he‚Äôs going through and I‚Äôm praying for him!

We left 10 mins after arriving cus there are 10000 other spots to choose from. Might stop by and give them a bag of pens just cus they‚Äôre down bad. 0/5 stars

originalText.text: We've been to Bravo before and had fun, but our recent visit for a friend's birthday left us disappointed. Despite a reservation for 8, we were squeezed into a small area and told we needed to order five bottles to stay there. We moved to a different section with a 2 am deadline due to a performance. After ordering three bottles and some hookah, we were unexpectedly asked to move again, this time with specific bottle brand requirement for the area. It felt uncomfortable, and we noticed preferential treatment for a specific type of customer (DRUG DEALERS AND SCAMMERS). They should either keep their bottle special promotion as advertised or stop promoting it if they won't honor it. Bravos staff seemed more focused on profit than providing a welcoming experience to its customers. We obviously left and took our party to a different establishment in the area, and ended up ordering 7 bottles that night. Unsure we will return to Bravo definitely not recommending it to friends.
